attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
The Nissan Navara has become a great all-rounder, the vehicle that can stand up on the job site, tow a caravan or boat on weekends, and take the family along for the ride. 
Once they were simply work vehicles that were only seen fit for use on the job site, but in recent times they've been tamed as they've been adapted to home duties. 
This beast takes you by surprise with it's size, it also comes with an immaculate Bose sound system fitted, its just the perfect all-rounder. How could you not want this car? Especially with a V6 motor pushing out power figures of 170Kw and 550Nm of torque!!
Now its time see this car for yourself!
attributes.title: 2011 Nissan Navara 3.0 dCi LE Auto 4x4 Double-Cab

Why you must buy from Koos&Mike used cars:
1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)
